body_html:
I am appending more simple bug fixes here, so let's wait to merge.

I find it very weird that a Variable can be undefined, and when it is, .data() just segfaults. This makes me concerned that there are a lot of other places that don't handle undefined well.

body:
I am appending more simple bug fixes here, so let's wait to merge. 

I find it very weird that a Variable can be undefined, and when it is, .data() just segfaults. This makes me concerned that there are a lot of other places that don't handle undefined well.
